scripts.build: npm run build:fonts && pug src/pages -o dist && shx mkdir -p dist/assets/css && sass src/assets/scss/main.scss dist/assets/css/main.css && shx mkdir -p dist/assets/js && shx cp src/assets/js/*.js dist/assets/js/
scripts.dev: npm run build && concurrently "npm run dev:pug" "npm run dev:sass" "npx vite"
